DIA_MILITIA_Q602_AboutVolker_03_02: During the battle, I saw this traitor fleeing towards the sewers.
DIA_MILITIA_Q602_AboutVolker_Him_15_01: Jsi si jistý, že to byl on?
DIA_MILITIA_Q602_AboutVolker_Him_03_02: My family ended up on the pavement because of him, while I was at the front! I'll never forget that dirty mouth!
